00071 //These enumerations define all of the various types of stationary garrison
00072 //groups, and index their compositions for forces, etc.
00073 enum
00074 {
00075       QUEEN_DEFENCE,                //The most important sector, the queen's palace.
00076       MEDUNA_DEFENCE,               //The town surrounding the queen's palace.
00077       MEDUNA_SAMSITE,               //A sam site within Meduna (higher priority)
00078       LEVEL1_DEFENCE,               //The sectors immediately adjacent to Meduna (defence and spawning area)
00079       LEVEL2_DEFENCE,               //Two sectors away from Meduna (defence and spawning area)
00080       LEVEL3_DEFENCE,               //Three sectors away from Meduna (defence and spawning area)
00081       ORTA_DEFENCE,                       //The top secret military base containing lots of elites
00082       EAST_GRUMM_DEFENCE,     //The most-industrial town in Arulco (more mine income)
00083       WEST_GRUMM_DEFENCE,     //The most-industrial town in Arulco (more mine income)
00084       GRUMM_MINE,
00085       OMERTA_WELCOME_WAGON,//Small force that greets the player upon arrival in game.
00086       BALIME_DEFENCE,               //Rich town, paved roads, close to Meduna (in queen's favor)
00087       TIXA_PRISON,                        //Prison, well defended, but no point in retaking
00088       TIXA_SAMSITE,                       //The central-most sam site (important for queen to keep)
00089       ALMA_DEFENCE,                       //The military town of Meduna.  Also very important for queen.
00090       ALMA_MINE,                          //Mine income AND administrators
00091       CAMBRIA_DEFENCE,        //Medical town, large, central.
00092       CAMBRIA_MINE,
00093       CHITZENA_DEFENCE,       //Small town, small mine, far away.
00094       CHITZENA_MINE,
00095       CHITZENA_SAMSITE,       //Sam site near Chitzena.
00096       DRASSEN_AIRPORT,        //Very far away, a supply depot of little importance.
00097       DRASSEN_DEFENCE,        //Medium town, normal.
00098       DRASSEN_MINE,
00099       DRASSEN_SAMSITE,        //Sam site near Drassen (least importance to queen of all samsites)
00100       ROADBLOCK,                          //General outside city roadblocks -- enhance chance of ambush?
00101       SANMONA_SMALL,
00102       NUM_ARMY_COMPOSITIONS
00103 };
